name: @greenpeace/dashdash
description: Script to run just after SCSS is compiled into CSS, to convert declarations in any selectors ending with --some-string-- into the same declarations but with a variable around the value. These declarations are added to the selector preceding the --some-string-- part, which will be created if it doesn't exist yet. You can also generate the name from the selector with `_--`.
author: inwerpsel
